description: This Java class defines the Note entity in a note-taking application, including its fields, constructors, getters, setters, and equality/hash methods. It uses Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note with properties such as id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, along with utility methods.

methods.name: createNew
methods.description: Creates a new Note instance with a generated UUID and current timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the note.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Checks if this Note is equal to another object based on id.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code based on id.
